homepage.title: Connect Without Boundaries
homepage.intro: Globol is your gateway to international friendships. Our platform breaks down language barriers, allowing you to connect, chat, and share moments with people from every corner of the globe.
homepage.languageLearning: Practice with native speakers in real-time.
homepage.culturalExchange: Understand diverse cultures directly from locals.
homepage.effortlessConnection: Make friends globally without language barriers.
homepage.globalCommunityDesc: Join a diverse community of users sharing their daily lives and unique perspectives from over 100 countries.
homepage.realTimeTranslationDesc: Chat seamlessly in your native language. Our advanced translation technology ensures you are always understood.
homepage.authenticConnectionsDesc: Move beyond swipes. Build meaningful relationships based on shared interests and genuine conversations.
homepage.exploreGuidesDesc: Looking for inspiration? Check out our curated guides on dating, relationships, and cultural etiquette.

about.title: About Us
about.intro1: Globol is more than just an app; it's a movement to connect the world without boundaries.
about.intro2: In a world that is increasingly connected yet often divided by language and cultural barriers, Globol stands as a bridge. We believe that true understanding comes from direct communication and shared experiences.
about.missionDesc: To break down language barriers and foster authentic global friendships through innovative technology and community-driven engagement.
about.visionDesc: A world where anyone, anywhere can connect, share, and understand each other, regardless of the language they speak.

contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.intro: We are here to help. If you have any questions, feedback, or partnership inquiries, please don't hesitate to reach out.

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.description: Oops! The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

datingChat.title: Chat
datingChat.errorReply: Sorry, I cannot reply right now. Please try again in a moment.
datingChat.limitReached: You have reached the web limit. Download the app to keep chatting.

seo.homeTitle: Globol - Connect with Global Friends | Real-time Translation Chat
seo.homeDescription: Break language barriers and connect with friends worldwide. Globol offers real-time translation for seamless global communication, cultural exchange, and authentic friendships.
seo.dateIdeasDescription: Explore unique date ideas, relationship advice, and local dating guides from around the world.
seo.aboutDescription: Learn about Globol’s mission to connect the world through real-time translation and authentic global friendships.
seo.contactDescription: Reach the Globol team for support, feedback, or partnership inquiries.
seo.privacyDescription: Learn how Globol collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
seo.termsDescription: Review the terms and conditions that govern your use of Globol and its services.
seo.datingDescription: Meet amazing people from around the world. Browse profiles, connect across cultures, and build meaningful international relationships on Globol.
